Package org.hkijena.acaq5.api.algorithm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ACAQAlgorithmDeclaration
    Describes an ACAQAlgorithm
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACAQAlgorithm
    An algorithm is is a set of input and output data slots, and a run() function It is part of the ACAQAlgorithmGraph
    ACAQAlgorithm.Serializer
    Serializes an ACAQAlgorithm instance
    ACAQAlgorithmDeclarationRef
    A parameter that holds a reference to an ACAQAlgorithmDeclaration
    ACAQAlgorithmDeclarationRef.Deserializer
    Deserializes the reference from a string
    ACAQAlgorithmDeclarationRef.Serializer
    Serializes the reference as ID
    ACAQAlgorithmGraph
    Manages multiple ACAQAlgorithm instances as graph
    ACAQAlgorithmGraph.Deserializer
    Deserializes an ACAQAlgorithmGraph
    ACAQAlgorithmGraph.Serializer
    Serializes an ACAQAlgorithmGraph
    ACAQAlgorithmGraphEdge
    A custom graph edge
    ACAQDataInterface
    Wraps a set of input and output slots that belong together This can be used for convenience
    ACAQEmptyAlgorithmDeclaration
    An empty algorithm declaration.
    ACAQEmptyAlgorithmDeclaration.Serializer
    Serializes the empty algorithm declaration
    ACAQIOSlotConfiguration
    Slot configuration that always ensures 1:1 relation between input and output slots
    ACAQIteratingAlgorithm
    An ACAQAlgorithm that iterates through each data row This algorithm type makes sure that input slots are always matched, otherwise errors are thrown
    ACAQJavaAlgorithmDeclaration
    ACAQAlgorithmDeclaration for an algorithm that is defined in Java code All necessary properties are extracted from class attributes
    ACAQJavaAlgorithmDeclaration.Serializer
    Serializes the declaration
    ACAQMutableAlgorithmDeclaration
    Instantiates ACAQAlgorithm instances
    DefaultAlgorithmInputSlot
    Default implementation of AlgorithmInputSlot
    DefaultAlgorithmOutputSlot
    Default implementation of AlgorithmOutputSlot
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ACAQAlgorithmCategory
    Available algorithm categories
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AlgorithmInputSlot
    Annotates an ACAQAlgorithm with an input slot.
    AlgorithmInputSlots
    Required to allow multiple AlgorithmInputSlot
    AlgorithmOutputSlot
    Annotates an ACAQAlgorithm with an output slot.
    AlgorithmOutputSlots
    Required to allow multiple AlgorithmOutputSlot
